mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, content, writer, created_date ) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, created_date, modified_date FROM board WHERE board_no > 0 ORDER BY board_no DESC, created_date DESC
SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, created_date, modified_date FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, modified_date = now() WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
